title: Kyo Kara MAOH!, Vol. 1
description: Yuri Shibuya just can't catch a break. First, he had his head dunked in a toilet. Then he was transported to another world--where he finds himself king of the Mazokus, a new race that expects him to lead them to war against all of humanity. And to top it all off, he's engaged--to a man!
author: Temari Matsumoto
